body.name: Copco Hand Cleaning Brush with Pan, Beechwood
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 1 hr
features: SET INCLUDES: a hand brush and dustpan
HOME ESSENTIAL: perfect for quickly cleaning dust, dirt, and crumbs from any space
SMART DESIGN: soft bristles efficiently remove debris without scratching surfaces; leather loops allow both items to hang from hooks for easy storage
SPECIAL HANDLES: long brush handle is great for accessing hard-to-reach places; brush and dustpan handles provide a comfortable, secure grip
DURABLE: iron dustpan, beechwood handles, and sturdy bristles stand up to daily use
body.description: Quickly clean dust, dirt, and crumbs from any space with this Copco Hand Brush and Pan. The soft bristles efficiently remove debris without scratching surfaces. The long brush handle is great for accessing hard-to-reach places, and the brush and dustpan handles provide a comfortable, secure grip. Highly durable, the iron dustpan, beechwood handles, and sturdy bristles stand up to daily use. Simply hang both items from hooks using the leather loops for easy storage. Set includes one hand brush and one dustpan. Wipe clean with a damp cloth. Brush measures 12.25" L; dustpan measures 8" L x 8" W x 1.25" H.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Attractive, durable, classic design
reviews.reviewText: This dustpan set is as useful as it looks. The dustpan is designed in a classic timeless look with the convenience of magnets to help the brush and dustpan to stay together. Great quality! Sturdy wooden handle that is attached securely to the pan. The lip of the pan is straight, and very slim making it easy to get all the dust and dirt swept up. The simplicity of the design with the natural elements makes so this dustpan set can be stored in the open without detracting from the flow of your area. Modern, rustic, retro -fits well with those design elements- and if not, it's a quality set to be stored and brought out when needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A good high quality dustpan with brush
reviews.reviewText: Seems a tiny bit overpriced for what it is, but it's still a nice solid metal pan. I've had several plastic ones break over the years and I can see this lasting for some time. It's nice and flush with the floor, but be careful not to warp or bend it, as it would be much harder to flatten back out and won't hold shape like plastic. The brush is of good quality and a nice addition for small cleans, but typically working with my own broom as needed, but there are some crevices that a broom won't fit, so why not have a great quality hand held brush?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars nice little brush and pan
reviews.reviewText: This is a good quality brush and pan. It is a bit smaller than I expected, but still very usable for small messes/areas. The pan is too small to use with even a small broom though, so it won't be able to do double duty. The brush brushes well and the pan is flat along the edge and easy to sweep into.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars high end dust pan
reviews.reviewText: Okay, I never thought I'd ever string those four words together - 'high end dust pan'. Why does it exist and who would ever need one? Well, I do. I got this for my workshop to pick up what little saw dust escapes the vacuuming and air filtration system. I've used the really cheap plastic versions that always leaves behind that line of fine dust that has to be sucked up by a vacuum. Cheap sets with a brush with coarse and snaggly bristles that manages to miss or let escape half of the things I'm trying to sweep up. And with a slippery pan that allows junk to slide back off.This set fixes all that. The pan being metal has very thin edges so all but the tiniest dust particles remains, and the interior surface is textured to grip and hold the dust from sliding back off. The brush is very bushy and practically everything I'm sweeping stays swept and pushes onto the pan. And besides this set is more effective and efficient, it's also much more appealing. It's a perfect fit for the workshop with its beechwood handles.This is definitely a high end dust pan with matching brush. It's more than twice what the plastic sets, but it's worth it to me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Swedish style with clean lines and timeless look
reviews.reviewText: Oddly, the look is what first attracted me to this dustpan. I love midcentury modern and classic Swedish style. It's a nice option for a smaller dustpan that you might use in a kitchen or workshop.Pros:- Soft brush bristles capture fine dust particles more easily in the first swipe.- The thin front edge allows you to effectively get dirt into it and not leave a line in front of the pan.- The black metal of the pan highlights just how much dust you are picking up.Cons:- It's a bit heavier than your average dust pan, and that could be challenging for folks with hand or wrist strength issues.- The single magnet that holds the brush to the pan isn't adequate. They might've added a second magnet to hold it in place more firmly.- Dirt doesn't slide easily into the trash bin when the pan is tilted -- you'll have to use the brush to push it into the bin.Overall, there's a lot to like here, and this will find a place in my home office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This dustpan is so pretty. I feel bad using it for it's intended purpose of cleaning up messes. The beechwood is gorgeous (big fan of light woods), construction is fantastic, it's super sturdy, I love the magnetic bit with the handle, keeps everything looking really clean and cohesive. The bristles on the brush are super soft, it really helps you get into small spaces (assuming the wood will fit or can be maneuvered around the area). Does a great job in general as a dustpan set, even just dusting into the pan, the lip is so fine it doesn't leave as much of a line of dust and dirt as my old pan.It feels like this is durable enough that it'll hold up and last for a really long time. May be endgame for dustpans. (Which is kind of a weird thought.) I love that Copco has an entire range of matching products. You can pickup an entire set, have it match, and really make your cleaning supplies look aesthetic and deliberate, rather than some mixup of found products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars As good as pictured indeed!
reviews.reviewText: There was absolutely nothing wrong with the cheap brush and pan from the dollar store. That said, I must say I replaced it with something I never imagined could look so good hanging in the laundry room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars nice looking, works well, but pricy
reviews.reviewText: This is a review for: Copco Hand Cleaning Brush with Pan, BeechwoodThis brush and dustpan appear to be handcrafted. They are made of metal and wood, with clean lines and no rough edges. The bristles of the brush are plush and thick and easily sweep into weird corners or under odd edges. The pan is flat to the ground and everything sweeps cleanly- it doesn't leave that dust line. There are sturdy hanging strings at the top of each handle. This has a very high end feel for a dust pan. It looks nice. I works well. I can't say anything bad about it except that spending 28 dollars for a handheld brush and dustpan seems a little extreme. The cost covers the quality, but it's still just a dustpan.
